job.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer - Java OR Ruby
job.description:
If you are a
Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
with experience, please read on!
This is a
100% REMOTE position, forever
!
We are a niche FinTech that is growing and continually transforming our industry! We are looking for a Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer to join our team! We are looking for someone steeped in either Java or Ruby who loves the FinTech world and is all about rolling up their sleeves and wearing many hats!
What You Will Be Doing
Design and develop high quality, scalable, multi-threaded, multi-tier, web-based applications using the latest technologies and software best practices
Be responsible for collaborating on a cross-functional team in story-mapping exercises; in certain cases sharing the responsibilities with the Principal Engineer in outlining the overall scope and user story process of product developments and enhancements for a project; participate in release plan overview as well as identifying areas of risk & exposure in group discussions
Participate in retrospectives, sprint planning, and sprint reviews for the team
Participate in directing dedicated QA testing resources for the team youre working on
Work with cross functional team in an agile SDLC; collaborate with product owners, technical team-members, business stakeholders and designers to implement enhancements or new applications
Propose innovative solutions to complex problems
Work closely with local and remote team members and management, to achieve high team morale and productivity
Share best practices and improve processes within and across agile teams
What You Need for this Position
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science preferred
5+ Years of experience as a full-stack engineer
Demonstrated leadership experience, either project or people leadership
Needs strong understanding of quality systems, continuous integration, unit and integration testing
Sound knowledge of
Ruby on Rails or Java
Proven strong understanding of design patterns
Proven strong understanding of Service-Oriented Architecture
Background in a MVC-based implementation of a web platform
Demonstrated ability to work well in ambiguous situations and pivot quickly
Demonstrated experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
Proven ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work
What's In It for You
We offer a compensation package of base, bonus and equity in a collaborative environment with great leadership!
This is a 100% full REMOTE position, forever!
So, if you are a Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Rhona.Kannon@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RK3-1644101 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Rhona Kannon - Principal Director - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
